amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to research or implement a distance-based fee system, commonly referred to as vehicle miles traveled, that would levy a fee on a surface transportation vehicle user based on the distance traveled.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used to implement Vehicle Miles Traveled or a distance-based user fee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
